website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering, in spite of a few concerns, if you prefer soft-sided luggage and don't need an extremely large set for your travels.
pros: Material is sturdy and expandable, which provides ample space for over-packers
Bags are lightweight and come in choice of several attractive color combinations
cons: Wheels are on the flimsy side and don't roll easily over all types of flooring surfaces
Handles and fabric interior come with some longevity concerns

customer_reviews.title: Planes, Trains, and Automobiles!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used the largest piece, but I love it! I used it for a trip to Germany. We were literally in planes, trains, and automobiles, and it held up perfectly! After the trip, the fabric did show smudges from airport handling but that’s to be expected. The wheels, handles, zippers, and inner structure are all great quality. I highly recommend this set. Plus, it arrived very quickly after ordering.
customer_reviews.author: D. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Serviceable
customer_reviews.text: Zipper placement for large compartment makes it hard to pack suitcase fully. Internal lining zipper splits and has no head to rezip. :/ easy to pull suitcase around on multi directional wheels. Grey is attractive. External pocket on carry-on is basically useless except for paperwork. A little tricky to get suitcases nested for storing. Definitely not top quality travel gear, but lasted for our trip across the country. I was worried about zippers. The zipper teeth on the corner of the carry on got misaligned so only one zipper pull can be used and the other is stuck (can’t open zipper beyond the teeth problem).
customer_reviews.author: Emily E. Jefferys

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE!! Satisfied Customer!  Handle on large case does not pull up. No matter how hard you try.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE!! Company sent me new luggage. Very happy. Only gave 4 stars because I couldn't get it until after vacation, but satisfied now. Suitcases looked good and I was excited. Opened them today to start packing for vacation. Handle on large suitcase will not come out. Husband pulled so hard on it he bent the bottom of the suitcase with his foot. It would not budge. Other 2 suitcase handles worked fine. So disappointed. We are leaving day after tomorrow, so there is no time to do something else. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Peters

customer_reviews.title: First luggage set
customer_reviews.text: Luggage set was ordered 1 day, shipped the next, delivered the next. It was a gift order and was well-received by the recipients. Color & sizes were as depicted. This was the recipients's first luggage set and they were thrilled to have the luggage in time to use on a trip. Comments from them included, "spacious", "smooth zippers", "sturdy handles", "smooth rolling wheels". I'll take that as a win.
customer_reviews.author: AlaskaKim

customer_reviews.title: Love the purple color!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this luggage set ......way ahead of projected delivery date! I am so impressed with the apparent quality of this product, but I will not be actually using them until mid-July. I will let you know how they performed after that. I will be taking an extended car trip, which, of course, is not as hard on luggage as air travel.
customer_reviews.author: WranglerGirl

customer_reviews.title: LUGGAGE IS NO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: do not buy this product I brought this product for my mother in September she didn't use it until December, as I was walking the luggage to the car the telescopic handle broke off in the medium luggage now I'm stuck with a luggage that I CANT USE
customer_reviews.author: Edwardo A. Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Seems very durable. I have used it on one trip already, looking forward to using it again. Love the deep purple color, wheels move in multiple directions to help maneuver through tight spaces. Rolls fairly easily over gravel, broken sidewalks, uneven payment, etc. The large case holds a lot with a lot of flexibility and "give" in the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to have my first luggage with all spinner wheels, but the excitement didn't last long as one of the wheels chipped on the biggest suitcase after only 2 trips! It's very hard to haul it now since the one chipped wheel makes it stuck. In the end, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Alma H

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! I just received mine in the mail today
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I just received mine in the mail today! All the zippers work and it’s a light weight bag. It does have an odor, it’s like a plastic smell.. nothing a dryer sheet can’t fix. Going on a trip in 2 week, I’ll revise once I figure out how well they withstand a trip!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal M.

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, holds a lot of clothes and the set was perfect for to adults to use for everything needed for a weeks vacation. This included not only clothes, shoes and assessories but also tons of make-up and gifts from the vacation!!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer adams

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy! The medium sized suitcase failed while packing, when I went to unzip it the zipper seperated from the suitcase, making it unusable. The large size the top handle broke after three uses. The little one is too small for anything.
customer_reviews.author: dani d

customer_reviews.title: It’s held up great so far
customer_reviews.text: It’s held up great so far. Love the pockets and and the handle at the bottom to pick it up is great. The wheels are nice, they swivel and it’s really easy to pull. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Christine W.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love these, have traveled several times and they have kept up greatly. Which I could buy another set.
customer_reviews.author: Lorac

customer_reviews.title: stuck handles
customer_reviews.text: the handle is already messing up and getting stuck & they arrived two days later than what they were suppose to so i didn’t use them for my intentional trip but did use them for the next one. otherwise they are lightweight and spacious
customer_reviews.author: marian_scissors

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic luggage
customer_reviews.text: Have used this luggage on quite a few flights now. Some within the us, some across the globe. It holds up beautifully. No issues with tearing, zippers, or wheels. Such a fantastic value! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elie

customer_reviews.title: Broken handle
customer_reviews.text: The handle on the big bag broke the second time we used the bags. The fabric on the handle is held together by a zipper. The zipper fell apart. Now there is padding and a sharp metal strap hanging out of the handle. Very unsafe.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Schmalzle

customer_reviews.title: Nice suitcases
customer_reviews.text: Got my suitcases today and I love them. Very roomy and seem pretty sturdy. The only problem I have is the big one, the 25 inch suitcase, has a tear in the inside material in one of the corners. Just hoping it doesnt continue to tear. Otherwise they seen great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just push, let the luggage do the work.
customer_reviews.text: My parents really like these once they were delivered, and now they feel better about making long international flights. Going through customs can be challenging for older folks with health issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far these seem to be an awesome deal!! I will update after I get to use them on my cruise!
customer_reviews.author: Cailey Pedersen

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after 1 use
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this in September and loved its look when I opened the package. However I just took the largest one on a trip with me and when I got to my destination and picked up my luggage, it had a rip in the bottom. I’m truly disappointed that this bag won’t be making the full round trip.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This set is awesome. Color is nice, wheels move smoothly, and holds up really well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sauer

customer_reviews.title: It is not worth the amount of money
customer_reviews.text: The quality is not as good as others. Gets dirty very easily and cannot be cleaned. I used one of the set for international travel for one time only, and it came back very dirty as if I have had the bag for 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I just used the middle bag and it was perfect. It holds a lot more than it looks like it will. The color is as shown. Just air it out a few days before use and you will be happy with the set.
customer_reviews.author: MARLENE

customer_reviews.title: Tough to maneuver when full
customer_reviews.text: Once the large suitcase was full it wouldn't roll well and was very difficult to push or pull through the airport.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain for Awesome luggage
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Very nice set. Traveled to France and Ireland. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Durable. Best luggage we ever had.
customer_reviews.text: This luggage stood up the rain and airport brutality. Though I did not get the color I ordered, I am still happy we purchased this set.
customer_reviews.author: Neci

customer_reviews.title: good.
customer_reviews.text: when i received it, the plastic material on the rim of the suitcase tore the fabric of the suitcase on the outside, that was a disappointment update: customer service were very kind and eager to help and they have helped me resolve this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Very goid
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Withstood a week in Europe and back to USA. No issues
customer_reviews.author: MIKE

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this luggage
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this luggage, the large piece had the inner liner torn and the outer zipper didn’t have the zip head. Had to take this way on my trip. It is a sharp, sporty looking and wheels worked great. But shouldn’t receive something that looks like it was used ! Threw box so don’t think I could replace.
customer_reviews.author: Victor H. Benavides

customer_reviews.title: These must be seconds of some sort - they came ...
customer_reviews.text: These must be seconds of some sort - they came with no zipper pulls on the inside liner zipper. I only noticed because the inside liners were partially unzipped. Rest looks okay. It is what it is, an inexpensive set of luggage. Did come with some sort of a newly manufactured smell. I hope it holds up okay for at least a few trips.
customer_reviews.author: bcaddy

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and buy it.  Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very durable to be so lightweight. Survived two legs of international travel without so much as a scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Rashida

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with the luggage and the service.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for 3 little boys traveling and a good price
customer_reviews.author: Belle Fleur

customer_reviews.title: Great Luggage Set
customer_reviews.text: I loved the set, it's how it's pictured, the colors are great and arrived even earlier then promised.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase. Do not hesitate. It is definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Brady

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: It was a nice set but, unfortunately, I had to send it back to the company because one of the wheels on the middle piece was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Angel F.

customer_reviews.title: telescopic handle can break.
customer_reviews.text: I found that you don't want to pick up your suitcase with the telescopic handle. Mine broke. Use the handle stitched in instead. Other than that it is good.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Quality a little better than anticipated. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: T. Jones

customer_reviews.title: I love them
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with it. The color is amazing can’t wait to try it out on my international trip month end... so far they are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Fabric material did not meet my expectations. Was not ...
customer_reviews.text: Fabric material did not meet my expectations. Was not confident on how long the stiching would hold up either. Ended up returning.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Customer service was excellent. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Shelner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect, glad I made the purchase and it’s really light
customer_reviews.author: Jaybella

product_meta.title: Merax Flieks 3 Piece Luggage Set Expandable Spinner Suitcase, Black&Red, One Size
feature_bullets: Lightweight durable 100% polyester exterior ensures long-lasting usage and easy transport.
4 multi-directional silent spinner wheels allow you to quickly maneuver in tight spaces and provide effortless movement.
Internal retractable push-button activated handle system designed for efficient and smooth luggage handle adjustment allows for a secure customizable handle height.

One luggage set (3 pieces) will be shipped inside of one another so you will only receive one package containing all 3 pieces for your convenience and to allow you to save valuable space when storing. Each set is sold together and we do not sell them separately. All three pieces will be delivered in one 19x12x31 box. Free 2-year warranty with each purchase.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars83 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
